name: Sonk's Platformer (Pre-Made-Jam)
description:
first game ive done in 6 months, for the pre made game jam, game is actually very short, since i learned how bad i am at level design, (2 mins approx)

game jam is here

only worked on this really for 2 days so i wasn't really able to polish it up and include sound but hey i tried :>

**Controls**

"WASD/Arrow Keys" - Movement

"Space" - Jumping

"F" - Interact with switches
